sen.j: 釈迦山大菩提寺（しゃかざんだいぼだいじ）とは京都府京都市山科区にある阿含宗本山の本殿。
sen.e: Shakazan Daibodai-ji Temple is the Agon Sect main temple located in Yamashina Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Shakazan Daibodai-ji Temple is the Agon Sect main temple located in Yamashina Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Shakazan Daibodai-ji Temple is the Agon Sect main temple located in Yamashina Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 毎年2月11日には「炎の祭典・阿含の星まつり」が開催される。
sen.e: The "Agon no Hoshi Matsuri" fire festival is held on 11th February each year.
The "Agon no Hoshi Matsuri" fire festival is held on 11th February each year.
The 'Agon no Hoshi Matsuri' fire festival is held on February 11 each year.

sen.j: 同庭園にある蝸牛庵は「阿含桐山杯」決勝戦の会場となっている。
sen.e: Kagyu-an (Snail Cottage) within the temple garden is the venue for the 'Agon Cup' Go competition.
Kagyu-an (Snail Cottage) within the temple garden is the venue for the 'Agon Cup' Go competition.
Kagyu-an (Snail Cottage) within the temple garden is the venue for the 'Agon Cup' Go competition.
